description:
Sophie spots her neighbor, Mori-san trying to carry a serious load of groceries and decides to help her carrying them.
Mori-san explains that she got carried away because she is going to cook their favorite dishes for her daughter and grandchild.
She sounds so excited that Sophie is inspired to try cooking something for Akari as well.
While Akari is out, Sophie begins cooking with Hinata`s help, but...
Source: crunchyroll
